item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 14, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Stoicism's Appeal to the Rich and Powerful (2019) (15 points | discuss)
2. Block Diffusion: Interpolating Between Autoregressive and Diffusion Models (6 points | discuss)

10. Y Combinator urges the White House to support Europe's Digital Markets Act (345 points | 234 comments)

20. Liu Jiakun Receives the 2025 Pritzker Architecture Prize (20 points | 4 comments)

23. Ask HN: Any jobs that don't force you to always be advancing career wise? (50 points | 52 comments)

25. IO Devices and Latency (368 points | 132 comments)
26. The 2008 coal ash disaster in Kingston, Tennessee (90 points | 61 comments)

28. ArkFlow – High-performance Rust stream processing engine (83 points | 46 comments)
29. Amateur Telescope Making Main Page (241 points | 50 comments)
